title: Deprecate -G -H -K model flags in favor of smart routing
description: The -G (Gemini), -H (Haiku), -K (Kiro) CLI flags are redundant now that smart routing and the Gum setup wizard handle model selection. Deprecate these flags: remove from README examples, add deprecation notice in help text, but keep code working for backwards compatibility.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Add deprecation notice in ralph --help output for these flags
Keep flag parsing code working (backwards compat)
Update any docs that reference manual model flags
